ol.li: of impervious material with a smooth, unbroken surface; and
uniformly graded to a floor drain.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: All walls and partitions must be of concrete or masonry with a smooth, unbroken finish for ease of cleaning.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: All joints between the floor, walls, partitions, ceiling, ventilation grilles, fittings, pipework, windows and light fittings must be sealed with impervious material for ease of cleaning.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: All joints between the floor and walls or partitions must be coved for ease of cleaning.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The body preparation room must be provided with at least one washbasin, fitting with elbow or foot-operated taps, and an adequate supply of hot and cold water.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The body preparation room must be provided with refrigerated storage facilities—

ol.li: With sufficient capacity for the storage of at least two adult bodies; and
Capable of maintaining an internal temperature between 1°C and 5°C.
